@use "/Users/olivierbossel/data/web/coffeekraken/coffeekraken/toolkits/sugar/index" as Sugar;
          $sugarUserSettings: (
  borders: (
    sizes: (
      smaller: 1px,
      small: 2px,
      default: 5px,
      medium: 10px,
      big: 15px,
      bigger: 20px
    ),
    radius: (
      smaller: 2px,
      small: 5px,
      default: 10px,
      medium: 20px,
      big: 30px,
      bigger: 40px
    )
  ),
  classes: (
    generate: (
      scope: (all),
      prefix: s,
      namespace: (sugar),
      icons: (fa-user, fa-star)
    )
  ),
  components: (
    title: (
      h1: (
        font-family: "title",
        font-size: bigger,
        vr-margin-bottom: medium
      ),
      h2: (
        font-family: "title",
        font-size: big,
        vr-margin-bottom: medium
      ),
      h3: (
        font-family: "title",
        font-size: medium,
        vr-margin-bottom: default
      ),
      h4: (
        font-family: "title",
        font-size: default,
        vr-margin-bottom: default
      ),
      h5: (
        font-family: "title",
        font-size: small,
        vr-margin-bottom: small
      ),
      h6: (
        font-family: "title",
        font-size: smaller,
        vr-margin-bottom: small
      )
    ),
    paragraph: (
      default: (
        font-family: "default",
        font-size: default,
        vr-margin-bottom: small
      ),
      head: (
        font-family: "default",
        font-size: medium,
        vr-margin-bottom: small
      )
    ),
    button: (
      colors: (
        primary: (
          color: #f2bc2b,
          modifiers: (
            50: -lighten 45%,
            100: -lighten 40%,
            200: -lighten 30%,
            300: -lighten 20%,
            400: -lighten 10%,
            500: -lighten 0%,
            600: -darken 10%,
            700: -darken 20%,
            800: -darken 30%,
            900: -darken 40%
          )
        ),
        secondary: (
          color: #6d858f,
          modifiers: (
            50: -lighten 45%,
            100: -lighten 40%,
            200: -lighten 30%,
            300: -lighten 20%,
            400: -lighten 10%,
            500: -lighten 0%,
            600: -darken 10%,
            700: -darken 20%,
            800: -darken 30%,
            900: -darken 40%
          )
        ),
        default: (
          color: #f2bc2b,
          modifiers: (
            50: -lighten 45%,
            100: -lighten 40%,
            200: -lighten 30%,
            300: -lighten 20%,
            400: -lighten 10%,
            500: -lighten 0%,
            600: -darken 10%,
            700: -darken 20%,
            800: -darken 30%,
            900: -darken 40%
          )
        )
      ),
      sizes: (
        smaller: 0.6,
        small: 0.8,
        default: 1,
        medium: 1.1,
        big: 1.2,
        bigger: 1.3
      )
    ),
    ul: (
      bullet: \2022
    ),
    ol: (
      separator: \.
    )
  ),
  colors: (
    default: (
      color: #848e91,
      modifiers: (
        50: -lighten 45%,
        100: -lighten 40%,
        200: -lighten 30%,

      )
    ),
    title: (
      color: #2b3438,
      modifiers: (
        50: -lighten 45%,
        100: -lighten 40%,
        200: -lighten 30%,
        300: -lighten 20%,
        400: -lighten 10%,
        500: -lighten 0%,
        600: -darken 10%,

      )
    ),

        600: -darken 10%,

      )
    ),

      color: #f0ad4e,
      modifiers: (
        50: -lighten 45%,
        100: -lighten 40%,

        500: -lighten 0%,
        600: -darken 10%,

      )

      color: primary,
      modifiers: (
        blade: #ff2d20,

        node: #68A063,

    ),
    title: (
      font-family: "Titillium Web",
      font-weight: 700,
      import: "https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Titillium+Web:wght@700&display=swap"
    ),
    quote: (
      font-family: "Palatino, Times, Georgia, serif",
      font-weight: normal,
      font-style: normal,
      font-display: auto,

    code: (
      font-family: "Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, Courier New, monospace",
      font-weight: normal,
      font-style: normal,
      font-display: auto,
      cap-height: 0.65
    )
  ),
  filters: (
    
  ),
  look-and-feel: (
    border-radius: 0.2em,
    padding: 0.8em 1.4em,
    padding-vertical: 0.8em,
    padding-horizontal: 1.4em,
    disabled-opacity: 0.5,
    line-height: 1.5,
    shadow: (
      layers: 6,
      startX: 0,
      startY: 1px,
      startBlur: 2px,
      color: rgba(0,0,0,0.08)
    )
  ),
  media: (
    defaultAction: ">=",
    queries: (
      mobile: (
        min-width: null,
        max-width: 639
      ),
      tablet: (
        min-width: 640,
        max-width: 1279
      ),
      desktop: (
        min-width: 1280,
        max-width: null
      )
    )
  ),
  sizes: (
    smaller: 0.3,
    small: 0.6,
    default: 1,
    medium: 1.5,
    big: 2,
    bigger: 3
  ),
  spaces: (
    smaller: 0.5rem,
    small: 1rem,
    default: 2rem,
    medium: 4rem,
    big: 8rem,
    bigger: 16rem
  ),
  transitions: (
    fast: all 0.1s ease-in-out 0s,
    default: all 0.2s ease-in-out 0s,
    slow: all 0.5s ease-in-out 0s
  ),
  typography: (
    font-family: "default",
    font-size: 16px,
    font-sizes: null,
    line-letters-count: 55,
    text-format-class: tf,
    vertical-rhythm-class: vr
  ),
  helpers: (
    flex: (
      order-count: 20
    )
  ),
  sharedResources: (sugar),
  settingsMode: variables,
  unit: rem,
  reset: true,
  border-box: true
);
          @include Sugar.setup($sugarUserSettings);
